issue.message: Suspicious namespace: Did you mean `http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto`?
`SeekBarPreference` must extend android.view.View
`AmbilWarnaPreference` must extend android.view.View
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)

On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up and restored on app install. Consider adding the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `UIStateManager` which has field `mContext` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `CalculatorInstanceHelper` which has field `mContext` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Use a `layout_width` of `0dp` instead of `fill_parent` for better performance
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `#EE000000` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Graph89Theme`)
This `RelativeLayout` layout or its `FrameLayout` parent is possibly useless

The image `ambilwarna_cursor.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\\ambilwarna_cursor.png: 8x8 dp (12x12 px), drawable-ldpi\\ambilwarna_cursor.png: 8x8 dp (6x6 px), drawable-xhdpi\\ambilwarna_cursor.png: 9x9 dp (18x18 px)

The image `ambilwarna_target.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\\ambilwarna_target.png: 13x13 dp (20x20 px), drawable-ldpi\\ambilwarna_target.png: 13x13 dp (10x10 px), drawable-xhdpi\\ambilwarna_target.png: 15x15 dp (30x30 px)

The image `folder.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi\\folder.png: 32x32 dp (48x48 px), drawable-ldpi\\folder.png: 32x32 dp (24x24 px), drawable-mdpi\\folder.png: 32x32 dp (32x32 px), drawable-xhdpi\\folder.png: 24x24 dp (48x48 px)

issue.message: Custom view ``AmbilWarnaKotak`` has `setOnTouchListener` called on it but does not override `performClick`
`onTouch` should call `View#performClick` when a click is detected

When you define `paddingRight` you should probably also define `paddingLeft` for right-to-left symmetry
Consider replacing `android:paddingRight` with `android:paddingEnd="@dimen/ambilwarna_spacer"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Consider replacing `android:layout_marginLeft` with `android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/ambilwarna_spacer"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Consider replacing `android:layout_toRightOf` with `android:layout_toEndOf="@id/ambilwarna_viewSatBri"` to better support right-to-left layouts
